wikipedia_page.main: Air Commodore Michael Horace Miller  (14 January 1928 – 8 October 2016) was a senior Royal Air Force officer who was active in the post-war years. He served as  Commandant Royal Observer Corps from 1975 to 1977, and was Station Commander of RAF Gutersloh from 1971 to 1973.He died from anaemia on 8 October 2016 at the age of 88.

response: *Michael Horace Miller (1928–2016), Air Commodore RAF in the 1970s and the 15th Commandant Royal Observer Corps
* Group Captain Michael Horace Miller, AFC.
*Michael Horace Miller, 88, British Royal Air Force officer.Miller
